JobTitle: Oracle EBS Developer  Senior Solution Specialist - USDC
JobFullDesc: Oracle - Sr. Solution Specialist - USDC  Are you an experienced, passionate pioneer in technology? A system's professional who wants to work in a collaborative environment. As an experienced Sr. Oracle EBS Developer, you will have the ability to share new ideas and collaborate on projects as a consultant without the extensive demands of travel. Consider an opportunity with our US Delivery Center - we are breaking the mold of a typical Delivery Center. Our US Delivery Centers have been growing since 2014 with significant, continued growth on the horizon. Interested? Read more about our opportunity below ...  The Team   Deloitte's Government & Public Services practice-our people, ideas, technology and outcomes-is designed for impact. Our team of over 15,000+ professionals bring fresh perspective to help you anticipate disruption, reimagine the possible, and fulfill your mission promise.  The US Oracle Offering has industry-leading experiences across Oracle products and solutions. We bring value to our clients through understanding the intersection of the business and technology, while bringing our clients industry specific preconfigured solutions to accelerate delivery and return on their investments. We're recognized as thought leaders in industry and as a Global Cloud Elite partner. Our clients affirm our position by sharing their stories of success in partnering with Deloitte and the Oracle practice.  Qualifications   Required   6+ years of experience in various phases of implementation life cycle: Prepare, Design, Build, Test, Deploy and Operate.   Design, develop, unit test, and deploy FRICEW (Forms, Reports, Interfaces, Customizations, Extensions, and Workflows) objects in EBS using various Oracle tools such as:  Oracle SQL and PL/SQL   Custom Forms using Oracle Forms and APEX   Develop Interfaces using Oracle Data Integrator (ODI)   Oracle Workflow Builder (WF)   Reports using XML Publisher   OBI Reports   Putty for Shell Scripting    Experience in converting Legacy data to Oracle EBS using Open Interfaces and API's will be preferable.   Should have proficiency in developing shell scripts for migrating code from one instance to another.   Techno-functional knowledge in building customizations in Federal Financials, O2C and P2P processes.   Experience with schema and table structures in various EBS modules.   Ability to conceptualize technical design options, identify the best option and complete the technical design specifications for the specific FRICEW objects.   Familiarity with Oracle suggested standards and approach for delivering EBS work products.   Experience producing quality deliverables as per the software standards (CMMI Standards)   Ability to communicate clearly with functional team to understand and capture the requirements accurately, support during the testing and acceptance processes.   Bachelor's degree or equivalent professional experience.   Must be willing to live and work in the Lake Mary, FL; Gilbert, AZ; or Mechanicsburg, PA area.   Limited immigration sponsorship may be available   Travel up to 20% annually (While 20% of travel is a requirement of the role, due to COVID-19, non-essential travel has been suspended until further notice.)
